channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned car walnut tree road council car park, 2nd November
item.description:
Car has been left in the car park and not moved for over 3 years, left parked over two car spaces.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Walnut Tree Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo all over sports cage, 2nd November
item.description:
Children play here and dogs are not allowed. There's multiple places with dog poo. It's not safe

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Somerford Grove Estate Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped garden waste, 2nd November
item.description:
Garden waste has been dumped on the pavement for several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Whites Grounds, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Utilities cover off / open hole, 2nd November
item.description:
A concrete utilities cover is off and it has left a very deep open hole. It’s 3-4 meters deep into some sort of underground utilities conduit. It’s a danger if someone doesn’t see it or if someone tries to enter it and gets stuck.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thistlewaite Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to brickwork on roundabout, 2nd November
item.description:
There was an accident some time ago where the brickwork on the middle of the roundabout was damaged, the vehicle coming down Bexley Lane and hitting the centre of the roundabout. This has never been repaired
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 234, Hurst Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 2nd November
item.description:
Dead fox found, has been placed in doubled up black bin bags, securely tied and left on pavement by hedge of 1 Wiverton Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wiverton Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kinglsey Road nw67rh, 2nd November
item.description:
Streets are filthy, trash and rubbish and leaves up Kingsley Road ; priory park road and Willesden lane. It’s a disgrace for the council tax we pay.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping huge fridge left by the side of the road, 2nd November
item.description:
Fridge left by the side of the road together with a fake Christmas tree and other rubbish on Rendlesham Road. It has been there for about two weeks.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rendlesham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Cleveland Terrace, Paddington, London

item.title: Half a dozen black sacks, 2nd November
item.description:
Dumped back sacks, although to be fair, the whole lane could do with being picked the is rubbish on both sides

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oak Road, Slade Green, London

item.title: Household waste fly-tipped next to bins, 2nd November
item.description:
Residents from townhouse across the road (number plate of their car pictured) seen dumping household waste next to apartment bins. Our bins are also being used by other people for generic waste and need locks to stop this please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crossway, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Callcott Road, nw67eb, 2nd November
item.description:
Entire road is full of leaves that need to be cleared and has been like this for days

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Callcott Road, London

item.title: Illegal A-board on pavement - 161 Mare Street, 2nd November
item.description:
A-board placed on the public pavement outside Paper Tiger (161 Mare Street) during trading. The sign is obstructing the footway & narrows the pedestrian route, creating a hazard for wheelchair users, people with pushchairs and visually impaired.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Vanbrugh Park, East Greenwich, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Various scrap items dumped obstructing pavement, 2nd November
item.description:
There has been various large metal items/building materials left outside my property against the garage wall. The obstructs the walkway and the items are sharp/dangerous metal pieces including a large boiler. I believe these items come out of no 11 Shelbury Close where I witnessed British Gas/Contractors working at the property which the home owners also confirmed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelbury Close, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
